sense.gloss: to believe, to believe in, to place trust in, to confide in, to have faith in

sdata.j: ↑証明↑↓しょうめい↓もできないのに、↑一体↑↓いったい↓↑何↑↓なに↓を↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓だと↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|のだ？
sdata.e: What do you believe is true even though you cannot prove it?

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|。
↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑言葉↑↓ことば↓を↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|。
↑君↑↓きみ↓のいうことを↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|よ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓がそんなことを↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|のはばかげている。
sdata.e: It is foolish of you to believe such a thing.

sdata.e: We soon believe what we desire.

sdata.e: What led you to believe it?

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なに↓かを↑信↑↓|しん↓じる|↑事↑↓こと↓が↑現代↑↓げんだい↓の↑若者↑↓わかもの↓にとってどれほど↑難↑↓むずか↓しいか、おわかりにならないようですね。
sdata.e: You don't seem to understand how difficult it is for young people today to believe in something.

sdata.e: If you see the day through with Mr Bark without losing your temper, I'll believe you.
